title: Your move riot
body: Australian dollar moved back up, whats your excuse now?

replies.body: remember when the aus dollar was 1:1 with the US? they didn't change it then. the price of any currency changes constantly, they won't change it each time it increases or decreases.
but they used the decrease as an excuse though didn't they?
You mean the rapid decline of the AUD over the past few months that's probably long term? That decrease?

> [{quoted}](name=greatdeathz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0fkQ84YU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-21T10:22:51.641+0000)
>
> but they used the decrease as an excuse though didn't they?

the AUS dollar is worth 0.78 US dollar. do I really need to say more?
The community moves with riot's hand...
